Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Repeals paragraph 9 of subdivision a of section 26-405 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to hearings regarding biennial maximum base rent adjustments
Summary: Relates to hearings regarding biennial maximum base rent adjustments.
LawCode: Rpld §26-405 sub a ¶9, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph 9 of subdivision a of section 26-405 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to hearings regarding biennial maximum base rent adjustments
